title: Kayn Bug?
body: I just played a game where I hit the bomb plant and Kayn's red form w knockup caused me to be hooked backwards, does this happen with other champions? (Like Cho'gath's knockup)

replies.body:
typically speaking you should get knocked up in place 
did you go the direction you hit the plant

So basically what happened was as i hit the plant to be flung in the opposite direction, just straight after i hit the bomb kayns w then hit me. I then went through the animation of flinging over to the direction i wanted, to then back to where i was hit with the w and knockedup, so it looked like i was flung backwards.

so it seems like the game interacted the way it was meant to and you only experienced a graphical bug which resolved it self 
this could have been caused by packetloss or high ping happening in the instance is this bug repeateable in a training match 
it would be good if you could record it for riot though i imagine it would still be a low priority
usually that only happens with hook abilities, but maybe kayns knockup is coding like a nautilus hook (which also applies a knockup).
